ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تُقَدِّمُواْ بَيۡنَ يَدَيِ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦۖ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٞ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tuqaddimu bayna yadayi al-lahi warasulihi wa-ittaqu al-laha inna al-laha sami'un alimun
ayah_english: O (you who) (O) you who believe (Do) not put (yourselves) forward before Allah before Allah before Allah and His Messenger and fear Allah Indeed Allah (is) All-Hearer All-Knower

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تُقَدِّمُواْ بَيۡنَ يَدَيِ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦۖ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٞ

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَرۡفَعُوٓاْ أَصۡوَٰتَكُمۡ فَوۡقَ صَوۡتِ ٱلنَّبِيِّ وَلَا تَجۡهَرُواْ لَهُۥ بِٱلۡقَوۡلِ كَجَهۡرِ بَعۡضِكُمۡ لِبَعۡضٍ أَن تَحۡبَطَ أَعۡمَٰلُكُمۡ وَأَنتُمۡ لَا تَشۡعُرُونَ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tarfa'u aswatakum fawqa sawti al-nabiyi wala tajharu lahu bil-qawli kajahri ba'dikum liba'din an tahbata a'malukum wa-antum la tash'uruna
ayah_english: O (you who) (O) you who believe (Do) not raise your voices above (the) voice (of) the Prophet and (do) not be loud to him in speech like (the) loudness (of) some of you to others lest become worthless your deeds while you (do) not perceive

ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tarfa'u aswatakum fawqa sawti al-nabiyi wala tajharu lahu bil-qawli kajahri ba'dikum liba'din an tahbata a'malukum wa-antum la tash'uruna

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَغُضُّونَ أَصۡوَٰتَهُمۡ عِندَ رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱمۡتَحَنَ ٱللَّهُ قُلُوبَهُمۡ لِلتَّقۡوَىٰۚ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٌ عَظِيمٌ
ayah_translit: inna alladhina yaghudduna aswatahum inda rasuli al-lahi ulaika alladhina im'tahana al-lahu qulubahum lilttaqwa lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun azimun
ayah_english: Indeed those who lower their voices (in) presence (of the) Messenger of Allah (of the) Messenger of Allah those (are) the ones Allah has tested Allah has tested their hearts for righteousness For them (is) forgiveness and a reward great

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُنَادُونَكَ مِن وَرَآءِ ٱلۡحُجُرَٰتِ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ
ayah_translit: inna alladhina yunadunaka min warai al-hujurati aktharuhum la ya'qiluna
ayah_english: Indeed those who call you from behind the private chambers most of them (do) not understand

ayah: وَلَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ صَبَرُواْ حَتَّىٰ تَخۡرُجَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ لَكَانَ خَيۡرٗا لَّهُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
ayah_translit: walaw annahum sabaru hatta takhruja ilayhim lakana khayran lahum wal-lahu ghafurun rahimun
ayah_english: And if they had been patient until you came out to them certainly it would be better for them And Allah (is) Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِن جَآءَكُمۡ فَاسِقُۢ بِنَبَإٖ فَتَبَيَّنُوٓاْ أَن تُصِيبُواْ قَوۡمَۢا بِجَهَٰلَةٖ فَتُصۡبِحُواْ عَلَىٰ مَا فَعَلۡتُمۡ نَٰدِمِينَ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu in jaakum fasiqun binaba-in fatabayyanu an tusibu qawman bijahalatin fatus'bihu ala ma fa'altum nadimina
ayah_english: O you who believe O you who believe O you who believe If comes to you a wicked person with information investigate lest you harm a people in ignorance then you become over what you have done regretful

ayah: وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ فِيكُمۡ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِۚ لَوۡ يُطِيعُكُمۡ فِي كَثِيرٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَمۡرِ لَعَنِتُّمۡ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ حَبَّبَ إِلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡإِيمَٰنَ وَزَيَّنَهُۥ فِي قُلُوبِكُمۡ وَكَرَّهَ إِلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡكُفۡرَ وَٱلۡفُسُوقَ وَٱلۡعِصۡيَانَۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلرَّـٰشِدُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-i'lamu anna fikum rasula al-lahi law yuti'ukum fi kathirin mina al-amri la'anittum walakinna al-laha habbaba ilaykumu al-imana wazayyanahu fi qulubikum wakarraha ilaykumu al-kuf'ra wal-fusuqa wal-'is'yana ulaika humu al-rashiduna
ayah_english: And know that among you (is the) Messenger of Allah (is the) Messenger of Allah If he were to obey you in much of the matter surely you would be in difficulty but Allah has endeared to you the Faith and has made it pleasing in your hearts and has made hateful to you disbelief and defiance and disobedience Those (are) they the guided ones

ayah: وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ فِيكُمۡ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِۚ لَوۡ يُطِيعُكُمۡ فِي كَثِيرٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَمۡرِ لَعَنِتُّمۡ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ حَبَّبَ إِلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡإِيمَٰنَ وَزَيَّنَهُۥ فِي قُلُوبِكُمۡ وَكَرَّهَ إِلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡكُفۡرَ وَٱلۡفُسُوقَ وَٱلۡعِصۡيَانَۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلرَّـٰشِدُونَ

ayah: وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ فِيكُمۡ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِۚ لَوۡ يُطِيعُكُمۡ فِي كَثِيرٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَمۡرِ لَعَنِتُّمۡ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ حَبَّبَ إِلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡإِيمَٰنَ وَزَيَّنَهُۥ فِي قُلُوبِكُمۡ وَكَرَّهَ إِلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡكُفۡرَ وَٱلۡفُسُوقَ وَٱلۡعِصۡيَانَۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلرَّـٰشِدُونَ

ayah_translit: wa-i'lamu anna fikum rasula al-lahi law yuti'ukum fi kathirin mina al-amri la'anittum walakinna al-laha habbaba ilaykumu al-imana wazayyanahu fi qulubikum wakarraha ilaykumu al-kuf'ra wal-fusuqa wal-'is'yana ulaika humu al-rashiduna

ayah: فَضۡلٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَنِعۡمَةٗۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٞ
ayah_translit: fadlan mina al-lahi wani'matan wal-lahu alimun hakimun
ayah_english: A Bounty from Allah from Allah and favor And Allah (is) All-Knower All-Wise

ayah: فَضۡلٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَنِعۡمَةٗۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٞ

ayah: وَإِن طَآئِفَتَانِ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ ٱقۡتَتَلُواْ فَأَصۡلِحُواْ بَيۡنَهُمَاۖ فَإِنۢ بَغَتۡ إِحۡدَىٰهُمَا عَلَى ٱلۡأُخۡرَىٰ فَقَٰتِلُواْ ٱلَّتِي تَبۡغِي حَتَّىٰ تَفِيٓءَ إِلَىٰٓ أَمۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ فَإِن فَآءَتۡ فَأَصۡلِحُواْ بَيۡنَهُمَا بِٱلۡعَدۡلِ وَأَقۡسِطُوٓاْۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُقۡسِطِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-in taifatani mina al-mu'minina iq'tatalu fa-aslihu baynahuma fa-in baghat ih'dahuma ala al-ukh'ra faqatilu allati tabghi hatta tafia ila amri al-lahi fa-in faat fa-aslihu baynahuma bil-'adli wa-aqsitu inna al-laha yuhibbu al-muq'sitina
ayah_english: And if two parties among the believers fight then make peace between both of them But if oppresses one of them on the other then fight one which oppresses until it returns to (the) command (of) Allah Then if it returns then make peace between them with justice and act justly Indeed Allah loves those who act justly

ayah: وَإِن طَآئِفَتَانِ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ ٱقۡتَتَلُواْ فَأَصۡلِحُواْ بَيۡنَهُمَاۖ فَإِنۢ بَغَتۡ إِحۡدَىٰهُمَا عَلَى ٱلۡأُخۡرَىٰ فَقَٰتِلُواْ ٱلَّتِي تَبۡغِي حَتَّىٰ تَفِيٓءَ إِلَىٰٓ أَمۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ فَإِن فَآءَتۡ فَأَصۡلِحُواْ بَيۡنَهُمَا بِٱلۡعَدۡلِ وَأَقۡسِطُوٓاْۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُقۡسِطِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-in taifatani mina al-mu'minina iq'tatalu fa-aslihu baynahuma fa-in baghat ih'dahuma ala al-ukh'ra faqatilu allati tabghi hatta tafia ila amri al-lahi fa-in faat fa-aslihu baynahuma bil-'adli wa-aqsitu inna al-laha yuhibbu al-muq'sitina
ayah_english: And if two parties among the believers fight then make peace between both of them But if oppresses one of them on the other then fight one which oppresses until it returns to (the) command (of) Allah Then if it returns then make peace between them with justice and act justly Indeed Allah loves those who act justly

ayah: وَإِن طَآئِفَتَانِ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ ٱقۡتَتَلُواْ فَأَصۡلِحُواْ بَيۡنَهُمَاۖ فَإِنۢ بَغَتۡ إِحۡدَىٰهُمَا عَلَى ٱلۡأُخۡرَىٰ فَقَٰتِلُواْ ٱلَّتِي تَبۡغِي حَتَّىٰ تَفِيٓءَ إِلَىٰٓ أَمۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ فَإِن فَآءَتۡ فَأَصۡلِحُواْ بَيۡنَهُمَا بِٱلۡعَدۡلِ وَأَقۡسِطُوٓاْۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُقۡسِطِينَ

ayah: إِنَّمَا ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ إِخۡوَةٞ فَأَصۡلِحُواْ بَيۡنَ أَخَوَيۡكُمۡۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ
ayah_translit: innama al-mu'minuna ikh'watun fa-aslihu bayna akhawaykum wa-ittaqu al-laha la'allakum tur'hamuna
ayah_english: Only the believers (are) brothers so make peace between your brothers and fear Allah and fear Allah so that you may receive mercy

ayah: إِنَّمَا ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ إِخۡوَةٞ فَأَصۡلِحُواْ بَيۡنَ أَخَوَيۡكُمۡۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ
ayah_translit: innama al-mu'minuna ikh'watun fa-aslihu bayna akhawaykum wa-ittaqu al-laha la'allakum tur'hamuna
ayah_english: Only the believers (are) brothers so make peace between your brothers and fear Allah and fear Allah so that you may receive mercy

ayah: إِنَّمَا ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ إِخۡوَةٞ فَأَصۡلِحُواْ بَيۡنَ أَخَوَيۡكُمۡۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ
ayah_translit: innama al-mu'minuna ikh'watun fa-aslihu bayna akhawaykum wa-ittaqu al-laha la'allakum tur'hamuna
ayah_english: Only the believers (are) brothers so make peace between your brothers and fear Allah and fear Allah so that you may receive mercy

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا يَسۡخَرۡ قَوۡمٞ مِّن قَوۡمٍ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونُواْ خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ وَلَا نِسَآءٞ مِّن نِّسَآءٍ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُنَّ خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهُنَّۖ وَلَا تَلۡمِزُوٓاْ أَنفُسَكُمۡ وَلَا تَنَابَزُواْ بِٱلۡأَلۡقَٰبِۖ بِئۡسَ ٱلِٱسۡمُ ٱلۡفُسُوقُ بَعۡدَ ٱلۡإِيمَٰنِۚ وَمَن لَّمۡ يَتُبۡ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la yaskhar qawmun min qawmin asa an yakunu khayran min'hum wala nisaon min nisain asa an yakunna khayran min'hunna wala talmizu anfusakum wala tanabazu bil-alqabi bi'sa al-s'mu al-fusuqu ba'da al-imani waman lam yatub fa-ulaika humu al-zalimuna
ayah_english: O you who believe O you who believe O you who believe (Let) not ridicule a people [of] (another) people perhaps that they may be better than them and (let) not women [of] (other) women perhaps that they may be better than them And (do) not insult yourselves and (do) not call each other by nicknames Wretched is the name (of) disobedience after the faith And whoever (does) not repent then those they (are) the wrongdoers

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا يَسۡخَرۡ قَوۡمٞ مِّن قَوۡمٍ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونُواْ خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ وَلَا نِسَآءٞ مِّن نِّسَآءٍ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُنَّ خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهُنَّۖ وَلَا تَلۡمِزُوٓاْ أَنفُسَكُمۡ وَلَا تَنَابَزُواْ بِٱلۡأَلۡقَٰبِۖ بِئۡسَ ٱلِٱسۡمُ ٱلۡفُسُوقُ بَعۡدَ ٱلۡإِيمَٰنِۚ وَمَن لَّمۡ يَتُبۡ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا يَسۡخَرۡ قَوۡمٞ مِّن قَوۡمٍ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونُواْ خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ وَلَا نِسَآءٞ مِّن نِّسَآءٍ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُنَّ خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهُنَّۖ وَلَا تَلۡمِزُوٓاْ أَنفُسَكُمۡ وَلَا تَنَابَزُواْ بِٱلۡأَلۡقَٰبِۖ بِئۡسَ ٱلِٱسۡمُ ٱلۡفُسُوقُ بَعۡدَ ٱلۡإِيمَٰنِۚ وَمَن لَّمۡ يَتُبۡ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la yaskhar qawmun min qawmin asa an yakunu khayran min'hum wala nisaon min nisain asa an yakunna khayran min'hunna wala talmizu anfusakum wala tanabazu bil-alqabi bi'sa al-s'mu al-fusuqu ba'da al-imani waman lam yatub fa-ulaika humu al-zalimuna

ayah_english: O you who believe O you who believe O you who believe (Let) not ridicule a people [of] (another) people perhaps that they may be better than them and (let) not women [of] (other) women perhaps that they may be better than them And (do) not insult yourselves and (do) not call each other by nicknames Wretched is the name (of) disobedience after the faith And whoever (does) not repent then those they (are) the wrongdoers

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱجۡتَنِبُواْ كَثِيرٗا مِّنَ ٱلظَّنِّ إِنَّ بَعۡضَ ٱلظَّنِّ إِثۡمٞۖ وَلَا تَجَسَّسُواْ وَلَا يَغۡتَب بَّعۡضُكُم بَعۡضًاۚ أَيُحِبُّ أَحَدُكُمۡ أَن يَأۡكُلَ لَحۡمَ أَخِيهِ مَيۡتٗا فَكَرِهۡتُمُوهُۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ تَوَّابٞ رَّحِيمٞ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu ij'tanibu kathiran mina al-zani inna ba'da al-zani ith'mun wala tajassasu wala yaghtab ba'dukum ba'dan ayuhibbu ahadukum an yakula lahma akhihi maytan fakarih'tumuhu wa-ittaqu al-laha inna al-laha tawwabun rahimun
ayah_english: O you who believe O you who believe O you who believe Avoid much of the assumption Indeed some assumption (is) sin And (do) not spy and (do) not backbite some of you (to) others Would like one of you to eat (the) flesh (of) his brother dead Nay, you would hate it And fear Allah And fear Allah indeed Allah (is) Oft-Returning Most Merciful

ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu ij'tanibu kathiran mina al-zani inna ba'da al-zani ith'mun wala tajassasu wala yaghtab ba'dukum ba'dan ayuhibbu ahadukum an yakula lahma akhihi maytan fakarih'tumuhu wa-ittaqu al-laha inna al-laha tawwabun rahimun

ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu ij'tanibu kathiran mina al-zani inna ba'da al-zani ith'mun wala tajassasu wala yaghtab ba'dukum ba'dan ayuhibbu ahadukum an yakula lahma akhihi maytan fakarih'tumuhu wa-ittaqu al-laha inna al-laha tawwabun rahimun

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَٰكُم مِّن ذَكَرٖ وَأُنثَىٰ وَجَعَلۡنَٰكُمۡ شُعُوبٗا وَقَبَآئِلَ لِتَعَارَفُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ أَكۡرَمَكُمۡ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ أَتۡقَىٰكُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ خَبِيرٞ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha al-nasu inna khalaqnakum min dhakarin wa-untha waja'alnakum shu'uban waqabaila lita'arafu inna akramakum inda al-lahi atqakum inna al-laha alimun khabirun
ayah_english: O mankind O mankind Indeed, We created you from a male and a female and We made you nations and tribes that you may know one another Indeed (the) most noble of you near Allah (is the) most righteous of you Indeed Allah (is) All-Knower All-Aware

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَٰكُم مِّن ذَكَرٖ وَأُنثَىٰ وَجَعَلۡنَٰكُمۡ شُعُوبٗا وَقَبَآئِلَ لِتَعَارَفُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ أَكۡرَمَكُمۡ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ أَتۡقَىٰكُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ خَبِيرٞ

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَٰكُم مِّن ذَكَرٖ وَأُنثَىٰ وَجَعَلۡنَٰكُمۡ شُعُوبٗا وَقَبَآئِلَ لِتَعَارَفُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ أَكۡرَمَكُمۡ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ أَتۡقَىٰكُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ خَبِيرٞ

ayah_english: O mankind O mankind Indeed, We created you from a male and a female and We made you nations and tribes that you may know one another Indeed (the) most noble of you near Allah (is the) most righteous of you Indeed Allah (is) All-Knower All-Aware

ayah: ۞قَالَتِ ٱلۡأَعۡرَابُ ءَامَنَّاۖ قُل لَّمۡ تُؤۡمِنُواْ وَلَٰكِن قُولُوٓاْ أَسۡلَمۡنَا وَلَمَّا يَدۡخُلِ ٱلۡإِيمَٰنُ فِي قُلُوبِكُمۡۖ وَإِن تُطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ لَا يَلِتۡكُم مِّنۡ أَعۡمَٰلِكُمۡ شَيۡـًٔاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٌ
ayah_translit: qalati al-a'rabu amanna qul lam tu'minu walakin qulu aslamna walamma yadkhuli al-imanu fi qulubikum wa-in tuti'u al-laha warasulahu la yalit'kum min a'malikum shayan inna al-laha ghafurun rahimun
ayah_english: Say the Bedouins We believe Say Not you believe but say We have submitted and has not yet entered the faith in your hearts But if you obey Allah and His Messenger not He will deprive you of your deeds anything Indeed Allah (is) Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

ayah: ۞قَالَتِ ٱلۡأَعۡرَابُ ءَامَنَّاۖ قُل لَّمۡ تُؤۡمِنُواْ وَلَٰكِن قُولُوٓاْ أَسۡلَمۡنَا وَلَمَّا يَدۡخُلِ ٱلۡإِيمَٰنُ فِي قُلُوبِكُمۡۖ وَإِن تُطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ لَا يَلِتۡكُم مِّنۡ أَعۡمَٰلِكُمۡ شَيۡـًٔاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٌ

ayah: ۞قَالَتِ ٱلۡأَعۡرَابُ ءَامَنَّاۖ قُل لَّمۡ تُؤۡمِنُواْ وَلَٰكِن قُولُوٓاْ أَسۡلَمۡنَا وَلَمَّا يَدۡخُلِ ٱلۡإِيمَٰنُ فِي قُلُوبِكُمۡۖ وَإِن تُطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ لَا يَلِتۡكُم مِّنۡ أَعۡمَٰلِكُمۡ شَيۡـًٔاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٌ

ayah: ۞قَالَتِ ٱلۡأَعۡرَابُ ءَامَنَّاۖ قُل لَّمۡ تُؤۡمِنُواْ وَلَٰكِن قُولُوٓاْ أَسۡلَمۡنَا وَلَمَّا يَدۡخُلِ ٱلۡإِيمَٰنُ فِي قُلُوبِكُمۡۖ وَإِن تُطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ لَا يَلِتۡكُم مِّنۡ أَعۡمَٰلِكُمۡ شَيۡـًٔاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٌ
ayah_translit: qalati al-a'rabu amanna qul lam tu'minu walakin qulu aslamna walamma yadkhuli al-imanu fi qulubikum wa-in tuti'u al-laha warasulahu la yalit'kum min a'malikum shayan inna al-laha ghafurun rahimun
ayah_english: Say the Bedouins We believe Say Not you believe but say We have submitted and has not yet entered the faith in your hearts But if you obey Allah and His Messenger not He will deprive you of your deeds anything Indeed Allah (is) Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

ayah: ۞قَالَتِ ٱلۡأَعۡرَابُ ءَامَنَّاۖ قُل لَّمۡ تُؤۡمِنُواْ وَلَٰكِن قُولُوٓاْ أَسۡلَمۡنَا وَلَمَّا يَدۡخُلِ ٱلۡإِيمَٰنُ فِي قُلُوبِكُمۡۖ وَإِن تُطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ لَا يَلِتۡكُم مِّنۡ أَعۡمَٰلِكُمۡ شَيۡـًٔاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٌ
ayah_translit: qalati al-a'rabu amanna qul lam tu'minu walakin qulu aslamna walamma yadkhuli al-imanu fi qulubikum wa-in tuti'u al-laha warasulahu la yalit'kum min a'malikum shayan inna al-laha ghafurun rahimun
ayah_english: Say the Bedouins We believe Say Not you believe but say We have submitted and has not yet entered the faith in your hearts But if you obey Allah and His Messenger not He will deprive you of your deeds anything Indeed Allah (is) Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

ayah: إِنَّمَا ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ثُمَّ لَمۡ يَرۡتَابُواْ وَجَٰهَدُواْ بِأَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ وَأَنفُسِهِمۡ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلصَّـٰدِقُونَ
ayah_translit: innama al-mu'minuna alladhina amanu bil-lahi warasulihi thumma lam yartabu wajahadu bi-amwalihim wa-anfusihim fi sabili al-lahi ulaika humu al-sadiquna
ayah_english: Only the believers (are) those who believe in Allah and His Messenger then (do) not doubt but strive with their wealth and their lives in (the) way (of) Allah Those [they] (are) the truthful

ayah_english: Only the believers (are) those who believe in Allah and His Messenger then (do) not doubt but strive with their wealth and their lives in (the) way (of) Allah Those [they] (are) the truthful

ayah: قُلۡ أَتُعَلِّمُونَ ٱللَّهَ بِدِينِكُمۡ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٞ
ayah_translit: qul atu'allimuna al-laha bidinikum wal-lahu ya'lamu ma fi al-samawati wama fi al-ardi wal-lahu bikulli shayin alimun
ayah_english: Say Will you acquaint Allah with your religion while Allah knows what (is) in the heavens and what (is) in the earth And Allah of every thing (is) All-Knower

ayah: قُلۡ أَتُعَلِّمُونَ ٱللَّهَ بِدِينِكُمۡ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٞ
ayah_translit: qul atu'allimuna al-laha bidinikum wal-lahu ya'lamu ma fi al-samawati wama fi al-ardi wal-lahu bikulli shayin alimun

ayah_english: Say Will you acquaint Allah with your religion while Allah knows what (is) in the heavens and what (is) in the earth And Allah of every thing (is) All-Knower

ayah: يَمُنُّونَ عَلَيۡكَ أَنۡ أَسۡلَمُواْۖ قُل لَّا تَمُنُّواْ عَلَيَّ إِسۡلَٰمَكُمۖ بَلِ ٱللَّهُ يَمُنُّ عَلَيۡكُمۡ أَنۡ هَدَىٰكُمۡ لِلۡإِيمَٰنِ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
ayah_translit: yamunnuna alayka an aslamu qul la tamunnu alayya is'lamakum bali al-lahu yamunnu alaykum an hadakum lil'imani in kuntum sadiqina
ayah_english: They consider (it) a favor to you that they have accepted Islam Say (Do) not consider a favor to me your Islam Nay Allah has conferred a favor upon you that He has guided you to the faith if you are truthful

ayah: يَمُنُّونَ عَلَيۡكَ أَنۡ أَسۡلَمُواْۖ قُل لَّا تَمُنُّواْ عَلَيَّ إِسۡلَٰمَكُمۖ بَلِ ٱللَّهُ يَمُنُّ عَلَيۡكُمۡ أَنۡ هَدَىٰكُمۡ لِلۡإِيمَٰنِ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

ayah_translit: yamunnuna alayka an aslamu qul la tamunnu alayya is'lamakum bali al-lahu yamunnu alaykum an hadakum lil'imani in kuntum sadiqina
ayah_english: They consider (it) a favor to you that they have accepted Islam Say (Do) not consider a favor to me your Islam Nay Allah has conferred a favor upon you that He has guided you to the faith if you are truthful

ayah: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ غَيۡبَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: inna al-laha ya'lamu ghayba al-samawati wal-ardi wal-lahu basirun bima ta'maluna
ayah_english: Indeed Allah knows (the) unseen (of) the heavens and the earth And Allah (is) All-Seer of what you do
